title: Chang Sheng Guai Tan Bu
overview: Seven mysterious listeners and Zhou Yu, the world's first storyteller, are trapped on a desert island. Soon, they find there a large number of clues related to the "Xu's Annihilation Massacre" which took place, many years ago. And it's not a coincidence -Zhou Yu is the sole survivor of the tragic events. With help of Liu Ru Meng, who pretends to be his wife, he's trying to solve the original murder case and find the real preparator. To do so, the guests must find clues in the six scripts, left on the island. Each of them, has a criminal case, which need to be solved, to have further information, about massacre. However, what the participants didn't anticipate, is that after each solved case, one of them dies.
